typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	SrcFileName as string
}
source(output(
		sourcefilename as string,
		outputfolder as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source(output(
		juliandate as integer,
		universaldate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> SQLLkup
Filter1stRow derive(SourceFileName = $SrcFileName,
		Julianportion = replace(substring($SrcFileName,  instr($SrcFileName,toString(year(toDate(currentTimestamp()))))+4),'.csv','')) ~> DerivedIdentifyJulianPortion
DerivedIdentifyJulianPortion, SQLLkup lookup(toInteger(Julianportion) == juliandate,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'first',
	asc(juliandate, true),
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Lookup1
source1 keyGenerate(output(Key as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey
SurrogateKey filter(Key==1) ~> Filter1stRow
Lookup1 sink(input(
		sourcefilename as string,
		destinationfoldername as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		sourcefilename = SourceFileName,
		destinationfoldername = Julianportion
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
